description: Online self-paced lessons with exercises on Möbius covering Algebra, Calculus, and Maple. Weekly deadlines with best 6 out of 9 grades counted. Includes video content and unlimited repeat attempts.

Two supervised in-person computer lab tests (40 minutes each) assessing basic skills in Algebra, Calculus, and Maple. Includes practice question banks. Lab Test 1 (15%) is hand-solved; Lab Test 2 (15%) requires Maple for some questions.

Typed mathematical solutions document using Word/LaTeX, focusing on written communication. Individualized questions with feedback on clarity and correctness. Submitted via Turnitin with late penalties.
2-hour comprehensive exam via Möbius assessing deeper understanding, unexpected applications, and Maple knowledge. Conducted in-person during exam period with past papers as preparation guides.
